org.grouplens.lenskit.iterative

Class ThresholdStoppingCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.iterative.ThresholdStoppingCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, StoppingCondition

    @Immutable
 @Shareable
public class ThresholdStoppingCondition
extends Object
implements StoppingCondition, Serializable

    Stop when absolute delta drops below a threshold.

    Since:
    0.11
